Html:
Hi,

I want to use the Composite Application Library. I have already study the codeplex guidance. The problem is that we have some Modules written in C++ which cannot be ported to C# or VB. Therfore my question is, can i use C++ Source Code within my WPF Composite Application Library? I never found an article or some information about using c++ code in WPF CAL applications.

Thanks for your response

Hi Alex,

Assuming you are talking about managed C++ code there should be no problem with using it as a module in a Prism application. The case is different if the C++ code is unmanaged as you would need to wrap the calls to that code.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman

Hi Damian,

thanks for your response, it helps!!!
